name: Curve25519.KeyAgreement
desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing X25519 key agreement.

items.name: struct Curve25519.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
items.desc: A Curve25519 private key used for key agreement.

items.name: struct Curve25519.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
items.desc: A Curve25519 public key used for key agreement.
